comment.author: 51012959@N07
comment._content: Very nice imagery: tone, depth; maybe also a psychological tension (restlessness?) in the depicted persons postures....only eight years earlier the strategic port of Trondheim was invaded by battleship Admiral Hipper and the german occupation army. Victory of the allied forces and peacetime is only 3 years old in this picture!

comment.author: 46508744@N04
comment._content:
Preciosa imagen 
espontanea y periodistica 
feliz dia

comment.author: 25550875@N02
comment._content: Che Paese meraviglioso, la Svezia. Non vedo l'ora di tornarci. (ormai sono quasi dodici anni che vi sono stato, ma sogno un nuovo viaggio. Chissà, forse il prossimo anno?)
